thread.section_title: Hotel de Nice - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location..good service
thread.title_full: Great location..good service - Review of Hotel de Nice, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Michael m
title: Great location..good service
text: This is a small hotel on the Rue de Tivoli, which makes it easy to get almost anywhere in central Paris. Buses go past the door and the hotel de Ville metro is a short walk away. The service was very good and extremely helpful which is always a bonus in Paris. The rooms are interestingly decorated if on the small side. There are a number of bars and restaurants close by which makes it easy to relax after a long day. We felt it was value for money and would certainly go back.
